tasks.task: Insert 3rd grain into the silo using a forklift
subtasks: Approach the silo with the forklift
Identify the correct position to insert the grain into the silo
Position the forklift carefully to avoid damaging the silo
Ensure the grain is loaded evenly onto the forks
Lower the grain into the silo slowly and steadily
Verify the grain is placed securely in the silo

tasks.task: Operate the combine harvester to harvest corn
subtasks: Drive the combine harvester into the cornfield
Set the combine's harvesting parameters according to corn type
Start the harvest process, adjusting the harvester's speed as needed
Monitor the grain quality and cleanliness during harvesting
Adjust combine settings for optimal performance if needed
Guide the harvested corn into the combine hopper
Operate the threshing and cleaning mechanism
Manage the grain flow to the combine's storage bin
Adjust the播种机's depth and spacing according to seed requirements
Engage the播种机's motor and start moving along the field
Monitor the planting rows to ensure even seed distribution
Check the moisture level and adjust as necessary
Verify proper seed depth and orientation for optimal germination
